column3: So can we close this PR because of it?\n
@petertodd told me he doesn't plan to fix #5079 (it fails unit tests at least)\n
@luke-jr See #6424, which hopefully I can convince @jtimon to finish for me. :)\n
#5079 indeed looks liks it is more general. Why two? not three, four, as long as the total scriptPubKey size isn't exceeded\n
